sentences.en: A prior engagement will preclude me from come.
sentences.cn: 重要的约会使我不能来.

sentences.en: A prior engagement will preclude them from coming.
sentences.cn: 他们因为有约在先,不能来了.

sentences.en: Anatomic constraints may preclude the insertion a transarticular screw unilaterally or bilaterally.
sentences.cn: 解剖制约可能妨碍单边或双边插入关节螺钉.

sentences.en: And although a modified waterfall approach does not preclude the use of feedback, it does not facilitate, accommodate, or encourage it.
sentences.cn: 虽然一个改进的瀑布型开发方法并不排除反馈的使用，但是它并没有促进、支持和鼓励反馈的使用。

sentences.en: At 84, John feels his age precludes too much travel.
sentences.cn: 在84岁时，约翰感觉到他的年龄不允许他作太多的旅行。

sentences.en: AV pump can preclude edema effectively.
sentences.cn: AV泵 可有效促进下肢长管状骨术后水肿消除.

sentences.en: Black holes are dense, but their event horizons preclude observations.
sentences.cn: 黑洞密度高, 但是它们的视界阻碍了观测.

sentences.en: General principle is that such clauses do not preclude implied terms.
sentences.cn: 普遍原则是这样的条款不排除隐含条款.

sentences.en: Impedance considerations preclude closing multiple paths in RF and microwave testing.
sentences.cn: 在射频(RF)和微波测试中,由于阻抗的原因,所以排除了闭合多条路径的可能性.

sentences.en: My present finances preclude the possibility of buying a car.
sentences.cn: 按我目前的财务状况我是不可能买车的.

sentences.en: rules that preclude experimentation in teaching methods
sentences.cn: 禁止进行教学方法试验的规定

sentences.en: Such a procedure does not preclude fracture.
sentences.cn: 这个方法不能消除断裂的发生.

sentences.en: That will preclude him from escaping.
sentences.cn: 那将阻止他逃走,那将使他无法逃走.

sentences.en: These conditions preclude our taking part in the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 这些条件使我们无法参加谈判.

sentences.en: This does not preclude the participation of healthy volunteers in medical research.
sentences.cn: 此种评估亦应涵括参与研究的健康志愿者.

sentences.en: This measure may preclude the exclusive agency from selling crucial crude oil.
sentences.cn: 这个措施可以使专有的代理不能出售决定性的原油.

sentences.en: We try to preclude any possibility of misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 我们努力排除任何误解的可能性.

trans.tran_cn: 预防， 排除； 阻止 from a given condition or activity)
trans.tran_en: If something precludes an event or action, it prevents the event or action from happening
to prevent something or make something impossible
